vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀπέναντι,
adverb, (ἔναντι) opposite, with genitive, [NT+2nd c.BC+]; before, in the presence of, ἀ. ὑμῶν[NT]; against, with genitive, [LXX+NT]
__2 absolutely, εἰς τὸν ἀ. βουνόν[Refs]
__3 ={κατὰ ἀνατολὰς νότου}, [Refs 5th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: opposite, in front of, against (opposition to)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
opposite, in front of, against (opposition to)
some classify as an improper preposition, opposite to, over against, Mt. 27:61; contrary to, in oppositition to, against, Acts 17:7; before, in the presence of, Mt. 27:24; Rom. 3:18; Acts 3:16*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: prep. con gen. opuesto; ante, ante la vista de todos; contrario a, contra
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 對面, 相對, ....前面
2) 敵對, 反對(徒 17:7)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 对面, 相对, ....前面
2) 敌对, 反对(徒 17:7)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: đối diện (với); trước mặt. ἀπό (G575) + ἔναντι (G1725)
